long_description: The 110mm KneeBinding Brake Kit is a replacement pair of brakes to use when remounting your KneeBinding downhill ski bindings to skis with waist widths of 84 - 110mm. Compatable with KneeBinding models Carbon, Shadow, Mist, KB12-C, KB12, KB9-L and KB9 (bindings sold separately). The 110mm KneeBinding brakes should be installed by a certified ski shop technician.
short_description: The 110mm KneeBinding Brake Kit is a replacement pair of brakes to use when remounting your KneeBinding downhill ski bindings to skis with waist widths of 84 - 110mm.
